means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 弗伦德绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“朋友”(friend)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"朋友"之意。
means: friend ： 一般用词，指某人喜爱并乐意与之相交往的人。
mate ： 最普通用词，既可指好友、同事，又可指合伙人，还可指配偶的一方。
acquaintance ： 指彼此相识，但交往不甚密切，相互间没有深厚情感的人。
pal ： 口语用词，指十分要好的朋友。

entry.def: A friend is someone who you know well and like, but who is not related to you.

example.ex: I had a long talk about this with my best friend...
example.tran: 我和我最好的朋友就此事进行了长谈。

example.ex: She never was a close friend of mine.
example.tran: 她从来就不是我的密友。

entry.def: If you are friends with someone, you are their friend and they are yours.

example.ex: I still wanted to be friends with Alison...
example.tran: 我还是想和艾莉森做朋友。

entry.def: The friends of a country, cause, organization, or a famous politician are the people and organizations who help and support them.

example.tran: 伯明翰皇家芭蕾舞团赞助者协会

entry.def: If one country refers to another as a friend, they mean that the other country is not an enemy of theirs.

example.ex: The president said that Japan is now a friend and international partner.
example.tran: 总统说日本现在是盟友和国际合作伙伴。

entry.def: If you make friends with someone, you begin a friendship with them. You can also say that two people make friends .

example.ex: He has made friends with the kids on the street...
example.tran: 他和流浪街头的孩子交上了朋友。
丹尼斯很容易就能交到朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. a person you know well and regard with affection and trust;

sentences.sentence: "he was my best friend at the university"

means.word_mean: 3. a person with whom you are acquainted;

sentences.sentence: "I have trouble remembering the names of all my acquaintances"

means.word_mean: 4. a person who backs a politician or a team etc.;

sentences.sentence: "all their supporters came out for the game"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English frēond, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vriend and German Freund, from an Indo-European root meaning 'to love', shared by free

sentences.cn: 这就是外界调控进行的社会治疗带来的问题：在现实世界中，就像在学校里一样，我们都会坚持选择自己的朋友。
sentences.en: And that’s the problem with a social cure engineered from the outside: in the  real world, as in school, we insist on choosing our own friends.

sentences.cn: 朋友之间虽无血缘关系,但其关联程度却相当于四代表亲,有大约1%的相同基因。
sentences.en: Though not biologically related, friends are as“ related" as fourth cousins, sharing about I% of genes.

sentences.cn: 正如加州大学圣地亚哥分校的遗传医学教授詹姆斯·福勒所说,“大多数人甚至不了解他们的第四代表亲，却不知因何会选择和好像亲属的人结交朋友。
sentences.en: As James Fowler, professor of medical genetics at UC San Diego, says, Most people do not even know their fourth cousins but somehow manage to select as friends the people who resemble our kin.

sentences.cn: 这项研究发现，朋友间具有相似的嗅觉基因，而不具有相似的免疫力基因。
sentences.en: The study also found that the genes for smell were something shared in friends but not genes for immunity .

sentences.cn: 这里面可能有很多机制的共同作用，促使我们选择基因相似的朋友，而不是为了利益，选择具有“实用关系”的朋友。
sentences.en: There could be many mechanisms working together that drive us in choosing genetically similar friends rather than functional kinship" of being friends with benefits!

sentences.cn: 尽管所有的研究对象都选自欧裔族群，但（研究人员）还是悉心确保所有的试验对象，不管是朋友还是陌生人都是来自同一个族群。
sentences.en: Though all the subjects were drawn from a population of European extraction, care was taken to see that all subjects, friends and strangers, were taken from the same population.

sentences.cn: 这也许涉及他本人的父母、朋友以及未来的伴侣的父母、朋友相关，而且还涉及媒人。
sentences.en: It may involve not only his parents and his friends, as well as those of the young woman, but also a matchmaker.

sentences.cn: 寻找专业的摄影师，而非你的伴侣或朋友给你拍照。【句子解析】本句是一个祈使句，由“谓语（Work with) +宾语（a professional photographer) ”构成；介词短语instead of your spouse or friend 作状语。
sentences.en: Work with a professional photographer instead of your spouse or friend.

sentences.cn: 我的驴和我的猫是好友人,他们不得拜别.
sentences.en: My donkey and my cat are very good friends. They must not be parted.

sentences.cn: 对敌人的怜悯等于对友人的残忍.
sentences.en: Mercy to enemy is as base as cruelty to friend.

sentences.cn: 中国的报纸以显著地位刊登丁玲 、 茅盾等友人悼念她的文章.
sentences.en: There , head articles in Chinese newspapers by Ling , Mao Dun, and other friends mourned her death.

sentences.cn: 大街来往着装多, 友人聚会名片多.

sentences.cn: 不要和坏孩子交朋友, 人们认为物以类聚,人以群分.
sentences.en: Don't be friends with bad boys. People think that birds of a feather flock together.

sentences.cn: 对友人设圈套,套住自己的脚.
sentences.en: Who spreads net for his friend, snares his own feet.

sentences.cn: 有很多友人为他送行.
sentences.en: There were troops of friends to see him off.

sentences.cn: 他们举行宴会欢迎国际友人.
sentences.en: They held a banquet to welcome their friends from overseas.

sentences.cn: 情人节心型实心牛奶巧克力是向你的特别友人表示关爱的一种绝好方式.
sentences.en: Valentine's Day Solid Milk Chocolate Heart is a lovely way to show special friends you care.

sentences.cn: 餐馆的老板没有朋友,人们会毫无疑问地把你视为装腔作势的人.

sentences.cn: 与友人闲聊,一个晚上很快就消磨掉了.

sentences.cn: 我们也愿意听取国际友人的意见,因此我们有很多对话的渠道.
sentences.en: We are also willing to listen to and comments from friends abroad.

sentences.cn: 我梦见海军中的友人.
sentences.en: I dreamt of my friend in the navy.

sentences.cn: 他哄骗友人相信他是个老实人.
sentences.en: He cheated his friends into the belief that he was an honest man.

sentences.cn: 他与国际友人交往频繁.
sentences.en: He is in frequent contact with international friends.

sentences.cn: 她喜欢打听友人的私生活.
sentences.en: She likes to pry into the private life of her friends.

sentences.cn: 在一位友人的心田.

sentences.cn: 一位外国友人在门口的照片.
sentences.en: A friend at the front gate.

sentences.cn: 我们更加亲密,在埋葬我们的友人之后.
sentences.en: And we all get together when we bury our friends.

sentences.cn: 不过即便你们没在一讫, 你们还是坚持了友人的闭解.
sentences.en: Whether you are together or not, you still keep the relationship as friends.

sentences.cn: 低语道你的友人必将死去.
sentences.en: And murmur that your friends must die.

sentences.cn: 我们喜欢并尊重对方的友人 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do we like and respect each other's friends?

sentences.cn: 与一位友人在漆黑的路上同行比你一个人在光明的路上孤独的行走更好.
sentences.en: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.

sentences.cn: 黄忠交朋友, 人老心不老.接触人,不在于年龄!
sentences.en: When Huang Zhong makes friends, he is old by age young in heart.

sentences.cn: 拉吉夫死后, 索尼亚在丈夫友人的支持下开始了一段坚忍的历程.
sentences.en: On Rajiv's death a stoic journey began for Mrs Gandhi, supported by her husband's friends.

sentences.cn: 不久你们在这周围打911, 就会连上通灵助手网了.
sentences.en: Pretty soon when you dial 911 around here, you're going to get the Psychic Friends Network.

sentences.cn: 教授的两个助手和他的一个朋友坐在他身旁.
sentences.en: Sitting round the professor were his two assistants and a friend of his.

sentences.cn: 朋友是助手, 友谊要长在.
sentences.en: Friends are hands, and friends for keeps.

sentences.cn: 他因贴身助手和老朋友的背叛而深受伤害。
sentences.en: He was deeply wounded by the treachery of close aides and old friends.

sentences.cn: 他是我朋友的近亲.
sentences.en: He is kissing kin to my friend.

sentences.cn: 对我们的近亲和好朋友, 我们表现得关心 、 和蔼 、 宽容、和慷慨,也不吝于施出援手.
sentences.en: To our close relatives andand friends, we are caring, kind , helpful, indulgent and generous.

sentences.cn: 心智健全的 、 正常的正派人都不会想到伤害自己的亲密朋友或近亲.
sentences.en: No sane, normal, decent person could ever think of hurting a close friend or relative.

Sentence.sentence: Veiseh can even put a date on when those tapes started recording: 15 December 2000, when he met his first girlfriend at his best friend's 16th birthday party.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When Katherine joined Facebook, some of her classmates at high school started to add her as a friend.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She looked at the list of over 500 friends she had on Facebook and realized some of them were not really friends at all.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Meeting people was the thing, and you went to coffee bars where you met friends and spent the evening.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Dogs, man’s best friends, have a clear strategy for dealing with angry owners—they look away.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: These findings are in agreement with what you would expect from the evolutionary theory: those who like to make friends and help others can gather enough resources to make it through tough times.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Seek true pleasureTo have a meaningful, happy life we need friends.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Just because I have a business relationship with an individual and I can profit from that relationship, it does not necessarily mean that this person is my friend, Soupios says.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living / nursing home near my town.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Think of a 3-year-old lost in the pleasures of finding out what he can and cannot sink in the bathtub, a 5-year- old beside herself with the thrill of putting together strings of nonsensical words with her best friends, or an 11-year-old completely absorbed in a fascinating comic strip.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That means we need modest, realistic expectations, and we need to teach people to cook food that's good enough to share with family and friends.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In some cases, schools should help children find new, more grown-up ways of doing the same things that are constant sources of joy: making art, making friends, making decisions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A friend told me the following story.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He could not watch television except for two programs aweek, could not play with his friends after school until he finished his homework, and had to read two books a week and write book reports about them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Just because I have a business relationship with an individual and I can profit from that relationship, it does not necessarily mean that this person is my friend," Soupios says.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Forgetting how to operate a familiar object like a microwave oven, or forgetting how to drive to the house of a friend you've visited many times before can also be signs of something going wrong.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I have a friend coming round in the afternoon, but I'll be at home, so the day after tomorrow will be great.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They sent me an invitation with a note saying I could take a friend for free on the first day.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B
